entry.title: R95 - 8246 Particulate Respirators for Welding (20/box)
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Face Mask
Price: 131.66

Helps provide protection against certain oil and non-oil based aerosol particles including those present with nuisance levels of acid gases* such as sulfur dioxide, hydrogen fluoride, and/or chlorine. Suggested applications include glass etching, chemical processing, paper processing, aluminum smelting and brewing operations. Lightweight construction promotes greater worker comfort. Meets NIOSH 42 CFR 84 requirements.*3M™ recommended for relief against nuisance levels of acid gas. Nuisance level acid gas refers to concentrations less than the OSHA PEL or applicable exposure limits, whichever is lower.

Qty/pkg  20/box
Qty/case 6 x 20/box (120/cs)
Sold/priced per Box

entry.title: Disposable Ear-Loop Masks 3-Ply - Black (50/box)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Expressions
Type: Surgical Mask
Price: 9.93

Health authorities recommend that non-medical masks be worn at all times in public and whenever social distancing is not possible.
That’s why Medicom, the company that has kept healthcare professionals safe for over 30 years, now offers Expressions face masks for consumers.
  • Plastic with metal insert fitted nose piece and ear loops provide a custom fit
  • 3 layers of breathable non-woven fabric
  • Latex-free
  • Dispenser-type packaging with a perforated opening tab
  • Does not contain graphene

entry.title: N95 - 9205+ Aura™ Particulate Respirator (440/cs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: N95 Mask
Price: 699.00

  • Designed to help provide reliable respiratory protection of at least 95 percent filtration efficiency against certain non-oil based particles
  • The lightweight, three-panel designed respirator helps provide quality, reliable, and convenient worker respiratory protection
  • 3M`s proprietary filter media, 3M™ Advanced Electret Media, filters dust and other particles, while allowing for easy breathing
  • The soft inner material provides added comfort while the soft nose foam and adjustable nose clip help provide a custom seal
  • Sculpted nose panel that follows the contours of your nose allowing more room for eyewear
  • Embossed top panel that is designed to help reduce the fogging of eyewear from warm, moist exhaled air
  • Innovative chin tab designed for ease of positioning, donning, and adjustment
  • Suggested applications include grinding, sanding, sweeping, bagging and other dusty or arid operations
  • Can also be used to help reduce inhalation of certain airborne biological particles like mold, Bacillus anthracis, Mycobacterium tuberculosis, etc
  • Example applications include emergency or pandemic preparedness planning, stockpiling, etc.
  • Before use, the wearer must read and understand the User Instructions provided as a part of the product packaging
  • Individual packaging and flat fold design provides convenient storage and portability
  • Compatible with a variety of eyewear
Certification(s)  NIOSH
Size Standard
Style Flat Fold
Exhalation Valve Without
Type N95
Colour White
